title: The Word That Wouldn't Come Out by Robyn Fielding
description: The Word That Wouldn't Come Out by Robyn Fielding. Read by Jane Slavin from the BBC Radio Drama Company. A Top 50 shortlisted story from BBC Radio 2's 500 WORDS 2015 competition, in the 9 and Under category.
